summary:
My Purpose is to serve people in teams to achieve sustainable results. 

My motto is “reduce to improve”

I live my purpose by serving in the role of Project Pilot - providing support for project teams by bonding with people to achieve sustainable results in projects - Facilitator and Mentor. 

Online, hybrid, and in-person with a focus on social projects in smart energy, climate change, agriculture, education, and sustainability. 
 
As ProjectPilot, Menno facilitates interventions for faster success in projects and programs: start-up (leave the harbor), get on track, rescue, and bring to closure. AgilePM® Workshop Facilitator, DSDM® Coach.

Menno partners with 1FOCUS -SPI - STS- IPEx.consulting - teaming company - TenStep - p3.express

Specialties: Project Management, Program Management, Portfolio Management, Team Management, Green Project Management, Agile, Scrum, KanBan, SPI, 1FOCUS, DSDM, TenStep, PM4R, PRINCE2, ICT, MS-Project.

awards.title: Green Project Manager of the Month
awards.description:
The GPM of the Month Award
As more and more companies incorporate sustainability into their projects to reduce energy consumption, increased recycled component usage, waste reduction , reduced water consumption, local sourcing and increased human rights adherance, and more. GPM certified project managers are being called on more and more to lead these projects.

The GPM of the Month Award is our recognition of those project managers who have gone above and beyond to integrate sustainability into their project practices and are proving the benefit to their organizations.
- See more at: http://www.greenprojectmanagement.org/gpm-of-the-month-award#sthash.h7Qcr3fA.dpuf

certifications.name: GPM-b Certification | Certified Green Project Manager Level b

projects.title: PMP UPDATE PMBOK® 7th edition Training
projects.description:
For PMP certified Project Managers under the 5th or 6th edition of the PMBOK® Guide, this is a training to be updated on the 2021 7th Edition of the PMBOK® Guide.

Full day course, by certified trainer Menno Valkenburg. Updated on all aspects and differences between 6th and 7th edition, e.g. Agile way of working, Psychological safety, 12 principles and 8 process domains, Delivery cadence, Iterative and predictive way of working, Tailoring and People management

projects.title: Project Management Fundamentals Training program for Bilfinger Tebodin
projects.description:
Developed and delivering a four day Project Management Fundamentals Training program to align Bilfinger Tebodin Project Management with PMI PMBOK(R) for Project Managers and engineers. Also developed a one-day PM for Managers training for Bilfinger Tebodin Directors and Managers. 

Training classes delivered in 
2016: PM Fundamentals Cohorts 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 and 2 sessions for Managers
2017: PM Fundamentals Cohorts 6 & 7
2018: PM Fundamentals Cohorts 8 & 9 and 1 session for Managers
2019: PM Fundamentals Cohorts 10, 11 & 12
2021: PM Fundamentals Cohorts 13 & 14
2022: PM Fundamentals Cohorts 15 & 16
2023: PM Fundamentals Cohorts 17 & 18

Training preparation virtual using Basecamp collaboration space.

projects.title: Begeleiding herinvoering Projectmatig Werken (PMW) bij de Gemeente Bergen op Zoom
Navigating MDB funded Energy Rehabilitation Program
projects.description:
In a Multilateral Development Bank (MDB) funded program, Menno supported the newly formed Project Executing Unit (PEU) with Energy Project Management Consultancy services to achieve the first disbursement and successfully launching the first procurement within the program. He also played a key role in the Program Launch Workshop and the development of a comprehensive Pluriannual Execution Plan (PEP), Annual Operating Plan (AOP), and disbursement projections. As a professional scrum master, Menno facilitated the initial sprints for program execution. 

He furthermore assisted the team with a day-to-day focus on key program priorities and the updating of planning tools (MS-Project and MS-Excel) as the scope and budget of the various projects under the program became clear. 

Menno also provided a solution for an (interim) online project knowledge sharing  / Project Management Information Systems (PMIS) to the program using Samepage and for the project team to share relevant project documents and sprint boards to keep focus on timely execution.

See also https://ewnews.com/millions-allocated-for-bahamas-energy-transformation

projects.title: Project Management Support to OffGridBox
projects.description:
Providing project management and business operations support to the Rwandan operation of OffGridBox.

Menno assisted the team in setting up an online project implementation system to support the Agile implementation approach the team is using.

projects.title: Technical host Virtual Symposium on Ending Child Labour by 2025, to ‘Act, Inspire and Scale Up’
projects.description:
Technical Zoom Webinar Host for the Virtual Symposium on Ending Child Labour by 2025, to ‘Act, Inspire and Scale Up’ on May 10, 2021, organized by the EU Delegation in Rome. 

179 participants from 43 countries with a 70% attendance rate. 

Preparing and delivering all technical Zoom Webinar settings including:
- Registration settings including disclaimer, privacy consent form, adjusted e-mail invitation texts, banners, and logo.
- Facilitating Practice sessions with moderator and panelists.
- Inviting Panelists.
- Setting up language interpretation French - English.
- Participant registration monitoring.
- Webinar reporting (attendees, Q&A).

projects.title: Development Project Team Challenge
projects.description:
For a Multilateral Development Bank we developed a Project Executing Unit team challenge to help improve project execution of 10+ projects in the country portfolio. 

We developed and implemented improved and aligned project Planning, Execution and Reporting Tools.

This helped the executing teams as well as the Bank’s supervising teams to better plan and monitor project progress.

At the end of the challenge the winning team was celebrated during a virtual event.

Outcomes:
- Improved annual operating plans
- Improved semi annual progress reports
- Improved knowledge and experience exchange between teams

projects.title: AI powered Meeting Minutes
projects.description: Using an AI transcription tool we can easily make magic minutes of your meetings. Whether you are in an online weekly project meeting, steering committee meeting or online board meeting, you want to make sure all that is being discussed is captured in a correct and professional manner. With the use of an AI transcription tool, we can create your meeting minutes within 48 hours.

contributors.headline: Consultant | Enterprise Model & Strategy | Capgemini Invent

projects.title: Facilitator of team development
projects.description:
I coached a team to improve team collaboration and implement a continuous improvement process using the 1FOCUS approach to improve results for the organisation.
In this project, I guided a consular team at an EU embassy in Cuba to improve collaboration, meetings and helped the team develop process flow diagrams for 16 consular processes. We developed and implemented a Consular Team Board to track progress. We implemented a meeting format that removed the need for meeting minutes, allowed the team to start and finish the bi-weekly meetings on time and finish the meeting full of energy.

projects.title: Project Support for Health Improvement project
projects.description: Provided Professional Project Pilot (Scrum Master) support to the Project Executing Unit of a USD 50 Million Health Strengthening project funded by the Inter American Development Bank in Jamaica.

projects.title: Proposal writing for Agile Coaching Consultancy
projects.description:
Supporting Agile Caribbean Joint Venture in writing a proposal for a large Agile Coaching Consultancy. 

An online project using Samepage as a virtual collaboration space, including video calls, chats, developing content for the proposal, populating technical and financial forms.

projects.title: ISH Director Search
projects.description:
The International School of Havana is looking for its next Director starting in July 2020 for the academic school year 2020-2021.

The ISH Board of Directors has established a Director Search Committee. Menno is the Chair of this committee. 

To support the director search Menno created an online workspace in Samepage where all relevant information is shared, including the vacancy profile, applications received, meeting notes, director search guidelines, interview questions, recruitment agencies, references checks. 

The project took less than 3 months to complete and saved the school US$ 30,000 - 40,000.

Blended virtual and in-person project.

projects.title: 1Focus New Business Booster
projects.description:
New Business Booster with 7 entrepreneurs using the 1Focus approach and 1Focus Tool (measure progress), Thinkific (online course) & Zoom (for weekly support sessions) as online collaboration tools.

Online project with an in-person end of project evaluation & learning session.

contributors.headline: I help leaders get more FOCUS for better results

projects.title: PPCR Jamaica Stakeholder engagement workshop for Results
projects.description:
Jamaica’s Strategic Programme for Climate Resilience (SPCR) under the Pilot Program for Climate Resilience (PPCR) was developed within the context of Jamaica´s National Development Plan -Vision 2030- and is designed to assist in climate-proofing Jamaica´s development.  The initiative which is spearheaded by the Planning Institute of Jamaica (PIOJ), is geared towards mainstreaming climate change into development planning, providing information on novel approaches including climate financing to overcome the challenges of climate change and disseminating lessons learned from adaptation interventions.  

In order, to strengthen the implementation of the Investment Projects under Jamaica’s SPCR, PIOJ has requested the Climate Investment Funds (CIF) through IDB to support a 3-day workshop to strengthen stakeholder engagement in the implementation of all investment projects; review investment project implementation progress against the PPCR results framework, learn from the implementation experiences (challenges, successes and adaptive measures taken), and identify areas where better coordination is required to maximize synergies and implementation pace. 

The four projects that will be discussed in the context of the proposed activities are:
1.	Improving Climate Data and Information Management 
2.	Adaptation Programme and Financing Mechanism 
3.	Promoting Community-based Resilience in the Fisheries Sector 
4.	Financing Water Adaptation in Jamaica’s New Urban Housing Sector

Menno supported the PIOJ in formulating the structure of a 3-day Stakeholder Engagement Workshop, for which he specifically facilitated the SPCR Project Management 4 Results session.

Blended virtual/in-person sessions using Zoom and Basecamp as virtual support tools.

Value and results are delivered by people. I help you and your team to achieve better value and quicker results in your organisation in the most sustainable way. 

I care about people and the environment and want to leave a better world for you and my children.

profile_positions.description: 1Focus is a network of registered consultants, all trained in the 1FOCUS approach for performance improvement. This approach connects better project or organisation results with a change in behaviour. 1FOCUS facilitates sustainable performance improvement in project environments.

profile_positions.description:
Regional trainer and workshop facilitator for Project Management for Results (pm4R) training classes in Latin America and the Caribbean. pm4R covers key aspects of Project Management for Development Projects: WBS, Timeschedule, Cost (S-Curve), Acquisitions, Risks, Communication, HR/Responsibility Assignments. We use a Moodle virtual classroom environment, webinars, video's and ShowMe whiteboard recordings.

I delivered pm4R training classes and workshops for over 300 IDB employees and executing unit staff members in Suriname, Belize, Costa Rica, Washington, Panama, Brazil, Trinidad & Tobago, Miami and Jamaica.
profile_positions.title: pm4R Trainer and Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
As a GPM360° Assessor, I provide GPM360 assessments for projects. 

Projects that achieve GPM360 certification are assessed against the P5 Standard for Sustainability in Project Management by certified assessors and Validated by GPM Global.

The P5 Standard for Sustainability in Project Management is the most widely used standard of its kind in the world and is applicable to virtually all project types. Projects that place emphasis on sustainability can become certified against the standard under the GPM360 model for excellence in project sustainability.

GPM360 certification helps to identify how sustainable a project really is. The process takes into account metrics such as:
- Product Impact: Lifespan & Servicing
- Project Processes: Effectiveness, Efficiency & Fairness

These are based on three categories, Social, Environmental, and Economic to determine how sustainable a project is.
profile_positions.title: GPM360° RegisteredAssessor

profile_positions.description:
TenStep is a network of experienced Project Management professionals, knowledge and powerful tools which helps your organization change and achieve results. 

Professional services we offer includes:
1. Workshop facilitation on Projects, Programs, Portfolios, Career Change and Networking.
2. Classroom, virtual, simulator-based and self-paced training courses in Project, Program- en Portfolio Management and Project Management Offices (PMO). 
3. 1-on-1 and team coaching in Project Management
4. Project Management Consultancy
